text: Georges Melies' Le voyage dans la lune (A Trip to the Moon) debuted in France. It is often considered the first real science fiction film.
The United States Library of Congress held the first of several meetings to plan the conversion of its materials to digital form to make them accessible by computer networks.
Apple released its Pippin game console in the US. The idea was to provide an inexpensive game-focused computer. Apple licensed third parties like Bandai to make Pippin consoles.
Google launched its Web browser called Google Chrome.
